Perluas Pelayanan Peserta, BPJS Ketenagakerjaan Jateng dan DIY Gandeng Perbankan
06 Nov 2019, 19:10 by agus heriyanto



Perluas Pelayanan Peserta, BPJS Ketenagakerjaan Jateng dan DIY Gandeng Perbankan



Perluas Pelayanan Peserta, BPJS Ketenagakerjaan Jateng dan DIY Gandeng Perbankan


KBRN, Semarang : Memperluas jaringan dan pelayanan sebagai Implementasi BPJS Ketenagakerjaan atau sebutan terbaru (BPJamsostek)  kepada peserta, salah satunya dengan menggandeng sejumlah perbankan. 
Hal tersebut disampaikan Deputi Direktur BPJS Ketenagakerjaan Kantor Wilayah Jawa Tengah- Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta Suwilwan Rachmat kepada RRI di sela-sela kegiatan pertemuan BPJamsostek dengan BNI dan BRI di Semarang.
Kegiatan tersebut mengusung tema "Mengoptimalkan Kepuasan Pelanggan melalui optimalisasi efektivitas layanan kanal BPJS Ketenagakerjaan service point office (SPO)" di Semarang, Rabu (6/11/2019). Hadir dalam kesempatan tersebut, pimpinan dari BNI dan BRI serta tim dari BPJamsostek Kanwil Jateng dan DIY.
"Upaya ini untuk mengoptimalkan operasional BPJamsostek dan mendekatkan pelayanan kepada pesertadengan mengandeng perbankan dengan beberapa bank di Jawa Tengah dan DIY," kata Suwilwan.Ia menjelaskan, kerja sama dengan perbankan tersebut mempermudah akses peserta mendapatkan layanan BPJS Ketenagakerjaan terutama Klaim Jaminan Hari Tua (JHT), karena tidak harus di Kantor BPJS Ketenagakerjaan, tetapi bisa dilakukan di perbankan.Ia mencontohkan, bagi masyarakat Slawi yang tidak ada Kantor BPJS Ketenagakerjaan, maka bisa ke kantor perbankan terdekat, begitu juga bagi peserta yang berada di daerah lainnya."Selain kerja sama dengan BNI dan BRI, kami juga bekerja sama BTN dan Bank bjb dengan total 102 bank pairing," kata pria yang akrab disapa Willy ini. Perbankan, lanjut dia, dapat memberikan informasi kepada calon peserta tentang program jaminan ketenagakerjaan, memberikan formulir pendaftaran kepesertaan baru, membantu mengisi cheklist kelengkapan berkas kepesertaan, melakukan perekaman data pendaftaran perusahaan,m pembayaran iuran,d perluasan kepesertaan program jaminan sosial ketenagakerjaan."Semua pengajuan klaim diakomodir terutama Jaminan Hari Tua karena berkaitan dengan individu langsung. Sinergi BPJamsostek dengan perbankan adalah untuk terus meningkatkan pelayanan kepada para peserta," demikian Willy.
Sementara itu Head Of Consumer Banking BNI i Gusti Nyoman Dharma Putra (Gustra) mengatakan,akan memperluas jaringan maupun titik untuk memberikan pelayanan kepada calon peserta BP Jamsostek terutama para pekerja.
“Dalam evaluasi tim dari BNI akan memperluas dan memperbanyak ,agar pelayanan yang lebih optimal akan memperluas jaringan dari 18 yang saat ini telah  ada di Jawa Tengah dan Jogjakarta,seperti daerah - daerah Industri Salatiga,Pekalongan,Kab Semarang dan Cepu,tetapi titik- titik akan dipertambah pada tahun 2019 ini,’’ ungkap Gustra.

Expanding Participant Services, Central Java BPJS Employment and DIY Cooperate with Banking
Nov 06 2019, 19:10 by agus heriyanto



Expanding Participant Services, Central Java BPJS Employment and DIY Cooperate with Banking



Expanding Participant Services, Central Java BPJS Employment and DIY Cooperate with Banking


KBRN, Semarang: Expanding the network and services as the Implementation of BPJS Employment or the latest designation (BPJamsostek) to participants, one of them by cooperating with a number of banks.
This was said by Deputy Director of BPJS Employment of the Central Java-Yogyakarta Special Region Office Suwilwan Rachmat to RRI on the sidelines of the BPJamsostek meeting with BNI and BRI in Semarang.
The activity carries the theme "Optimizing Customer Satisfaction through optimizing the effectiveness of BPJS Employment service point office (SPO) channel services" in Semarang, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Present on the occasion, leaders from BNI and BRI and a team from BPJamsostek Regional Office of Central Java and Yogyakarta.
"This effort is to optimize BPJamsostek operations and bring services closer to participants by cooperating with banks with a number of banks in Central Java and DIY," Suwilwan said. He explained, the cooperation with banks made it easier for participants to access BPJS Employment services, especially Old Age Claims (JHT) because it does not have to be at the BPJS Manpower Office, but it can be done in banking. He gave an example, for Slawi people who do not have a BPJS Manpower Office, then it can go to the nearest banking office, as well as participants who are in other areas. "Besides cooperation with BNI and BRI, we also work with BTN and Bank BJB with a total of 102 bank pairings, "said the man who is familiarly called Willy. Banking, he continued, can provide information to prospective participants about the employment guarantee program, provide a new membership registration form, help fill out a complete membership file checklist, record company registration data, make payment of contributions, and expand membership in the social security employment program. " claims are accommodated especially Old Age Guarantees because they relate to individuals directly. BPJamsostek's synergy with banks is to continue to improve services to participants, "Willy said.
Meanwhile Head of Consumer Banking BNI i Gusti Nyoman Dharma Putra (Gustra) said, would expand the network and the point to provide services to prospective BP Social Security participants, especially workers.
"In the evaluation, the team from BNI will expand and multiply, so that more optimal services will expand the network of the 18 that currently exist in Central Java and Jogjakarta, such as the Salatiga, Pekalongan, Semarang and Cepu Regency areas, but the points are will be added in 2019, '' said Gustra.
